headline: Viatris Announces Five Data Presentations on Novel Fast-Acting Meloxicam (MR-107A-02) at PAINWeek 2025 Conference
summary: Viatris (Nasdaq: VTRS), a global healthcare company, today announced that five abstracts from its Phase 3 program evaluating novel fast-acting formulation of meloxicam (MR-107A-02) in moderate-to-severe acute surgical pain models will be presented at the PAINWeek 2025 national conference in Las Vegas from September 2-5, 2025.
